resources.string: From the home screen, click on the \'Browse\' button.
Tap any available Comment to view it\'s body, and it\'s replies.

Tap on the sort comments icon (see above) and select any of the available sorting options to sort the current list of comments. If \'Sort by proximity to location\' is selected you will have to select your location on the map and press the \'Set Location\' button to sort the comments with proximity to the given location. On older APIs you will be redirected to an activity where you will can enter coordinate location manually and press the \'Set Location\' button to sort the comments with proximity to the given location.

To bookmark comments tap the bookmark icon (see above) on the action bar to highlight it blue. Once it is highlighted blue, tap on all the comments you wish to bookmark, then press the bookmark icon again to un-highlight it. All of the comments which you have selected will have a highlighted blue bookmark icon and will have been added to your bookmarks.

To view bookmarked comments either return to the application main screen and tap the button labeled \'Bookmarks\' or tap the menu button (see above) and select the \'My Bookmarks\' option. Once a bookmarked comment is viewed, it will be removed from your list of bookmarked comments.

To favorite a comments you must first tap the comment, to view the comment. Then press the favorite icon (see above) to favorite the comment. When the comment has been successfully favorited, the favorite icon will be highlighted blue.
To view favourited comments either return to the application main screen and tap the button labeled \'Favourites\' or tap the menu button (see above) and select the \'My Favourites\' option.

To create a new top level comment you must be currently viewing the root comments. An easy way to access the root comments is to go to the application\'s main screen then tap the button labeled \'Browse\'. Once you are viewing the list of root comments tap the new comment button (see above). This will bring you to the comment creation activity. Fill in the title, body fields. To set your comment\'s location tap the button labeled \'LOCATION\' and either select \'get current location\' to automatically retrieve your current location or manually set your location by selecting the \'set location\' option. To add a picture to your comment tap the button labeled \'ADD PICTURE\' and either select the \'Take new photo\' option to take a new photo and use that or the \'Take from gallery\' option to add a pre-existing photo.\n\nTo post the comment tap the button labeled \'POST\' or tap the button labeled \'CANCEL\' to cancel the comment.

To create a new reply you must be currently viewing a comment. Once you are viewing the comment, to reply to it simply tap the \'new comment/reply\' button in the action bar (see above). This will redirect you to the comment creation activity, fill in the fields, set location, add pictures the same as is explained in the \'Create Top Level Comment\' explanation.

To edit your profile tap on the menu button (see above) and select the \'My Profile\' option. This will redirect your to your profile, where you can edit all the fields and give yourself a profile picture. To add a picture, tap the button labeled \'ADD PICTURE\' and either select the \'Take new photo\' option to take a new picture, or select the \'Take from gallery\' to select a picture from your phone\'s gallery. When you are ready to save your profile, tap the \'POST\' button, or press the \'CANCEL\' button to delete your changes.

To view a profile you must be viewing one of the author\'s comments. Once you are viewing the desired author\'s comment, tap the author\'s name, which will be highlighted blue. This will bring you to the author\'s profile.
